errors.error_description: The code example `p.plural word` is missing parentheses for the method call, which will cause a Python SyntaxError.
correction_candidates: print("The plural of ", word, " is ", p.plural(word))
print("The plural of ", word, " is ", p.plural[word])
print("The plural of ", word, " is ", p.plural({word}))
print("The plural of ", word, " is ", p.pluralize(word))
errors.golden_answer: print("The plural of ", word, " is ", p.plural(word))
